title: NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation
notes: The install from Steam works fine, game won't start, and gives an error: "FATAL ERROR: Direct3D returned with an unknown error code. X11/GNU/Linux was detected so this is most likely an implementation error inside the DirectX emulation layer of your OS." The game uses Direct3D version 11.

title: NoLimits 2 Roller Coaster Simulation
notes: The game crashes as soon as it launches. A window pops up saying "Direct3D returned with an unknown error code. X11/GNU/Linux was detected so this is most likely an implementation error inside the DirectX emulation layer of your OS."
